items.1: I am an Item from a different survey.
items.3: My parents say I was a calm child.
items.4: I now think a lot about shark.
items.5: If I saw a shark now, I would feel very panicky.
items.6: Sharks are one of my worst fears.
items.7: I feel very nervous if I saw a shark now.
items.8: If I saw a shark now I would probably break out in a sweat and my heart would beat faster.
